Press Coverage Podcast 1/27: NBA Hot Topics w/ Matt Sandell of GoingFor2

Subscribe to Press Coverage on iTunes, Stitcher, TuneIn Radio or Podbean.com

Matt and I are once again tackling the big stories in the NBA tonight. Everything from who the MVP is at the half way point, are the Cavs in trouble, what trade needs to be made before the deadline, and what robots have to do with NBA officiating. All this and more on today’s episode of the Press Coverage Podcast on TalkLoudRadio.
